main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before contacting any provider, make sure you understand what is being offered, how credentials are verified, and what questions you need answered in writing.

Methodology

How %%BRAND_NAME%% builds personal injury pages

We publish decision frameworks, checklists, and neutral directories. We do not rank, recommend, or endorse providers.

What we do

  • Frameworks: plain-language checklists for documentation, questions to ask, and comparison criteria.
  • Neutral directories (where present): informational entries using a limited data format (name + official website link only).
  • FAQ answers: short, voice-friendly responses designed to reduce confusion — not replace professional advice.

What we do not do

  • No “best/top” rankings.
  • No endorsements or referral fees.
  • No lead selling.

Advertising disclosure

Advertising placements are labeled “Advertising” and visually separated from editorial content. Advertising does not control what we publish.

%%AD:global_methodology_bottom%%

Why this matters: clarifying expectations early reduces misunderstandings, delays, and unnecessary costs later.
